description: Weerasekara Kankanam Arachchige Roshan Indika Vs D. D. K. Gamage Commissioner of Lands,  and Four Others - before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J
parties: Weerasekara Kankanam Arachchige Roshan Indika Vs D. D. K. Gamage Commissioner of Lands,  and Four Others -
keywords: Duty of the Government Agent or the Land Officers to give effect to the directions given by the Commissioner General of Lands. - Divisional Secretary has no authority to proceed with an action to eject the occupants under State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act disregarding the directions of the Commissioner General of Lands.
